# Copilot Instructions for Maturion AI Foreman

## Repository Overview
This is the Foreman Repository that manages all builder agents for the Maturion ISMS project.

## Purpose
The Maturion AI Foreman is responsible for:
- Managing builder agents
- Coordinating tasks across multiple AI agents
- Maintaining the agent infrastructure

## Development Guidelines
- Follow best practices for agent management
- Ensure all changes are well-documented
- Test thoroughly before deploying agent configurations

## When Working on Issues
- Review the repository structure before making changes
- Consider the impact on all managed builder agents
- Update documentation as needed
- Follow the project's coding standards
